title: Forwarding texts
content: How do I forward a text to another number?  I have received a fraudulent attempt to access my phone and been instructed to forward to EE (on twitter) so they can investigate.  Looking online many solutions suggest clicking on three dots and selecting forward, however that is not available when I click the three dots.  I am obviously having to be careful whilst in the text as it contains a link I should not click - can anyone tell me how to forward please?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
